metadata.name: sss_oracle
metadata.description: Oracle Integration Module for Solana Stablecoin Standard

instructions.name: accept_authority_transfer
docs: Accept a pending authority transfer (must be signed by new authority)

instructions.name: get_mint_quote
docs: Get a mint quote — USD in → tokens out

instructions.name: get_redeem_quote
docs: Get a redeem quote — tokens in → USD out

instructions.name: initialize_oracle
docs: Initialize an oracle config for a specific SSS token mint

instructions.name: initialize_registry
docs: Initialize the global feed registry (one-time, admin only)

instructions.name: mint_with_oracle
docs: Execute a stored mint quote — validates + emits event atomically

instructions.name: register_feed
docs: Register a new price feed (e.g. BRLUSD, EURUSD, JPYUSD)

instructions.name: update_cpi_multiplier
docs: Update CPI multiplier (monthly admin operation for CpiIndexed tokens)

errors.name: PriceTooStale
errors.msg: Price feed is stale — last update exceeds max_staleness threshold

errors.name: InvalidPrice
errors.msg: Price feed returned a negative or zero value

errors.name: ConfidenceTooWide
errors.msg: Price confidence interval is too wide — market is too volatile to price safely

errors.name: FeedNotReady
errors.msg: Switchboard aggregator account data is invalid or unreadable

errors.name: QuoteExpired
errors.msg: Quote has expired — please request a new quote

errors.name: QuoteAlreadyUsed
errors.msg: Quote has already been used

errors.name: SlippageExceeded
errors.msg: Token amount is below slippage threshold (min_output)

errors.name: ZeroAmount
errors.msg: Input amount must be greater than zero

errors.name: ZeroOutput
errors.msg: Calculated output amount is zero after fee deduction

errors.name: FeedAlreadyRegistered
errors.msg: Feed with this symbol already exists in the registry

errors.name: FeedNotFound
errors.msg: Feed symbol not found in registry

errors.name: SymbolTooLong
errors.msg: Feed symbol exceeds maximum length of 12 characters

errors.name: RegistryFull
errors.msg: Registry is at maximum capacity (64 feeds)

errors.name: OraclePaused
errors.msg: Oracle is paused — mint and redeem operations are suspended

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Signer is not the oracle authority

errors.name: NoPendingTransfer
errors.msg: No pending authority transfer exists

errors.name: InvalidCpiMultiplier
errors.msg: CPI multiplier cannot be zero

errors.name: CpiUpdateTooSoon
errors.msg: CPI multiplier update too soon — minimum interval not reached

errors.name: MathOverflow
errors.msg: Arithmetic overflow in calculation

errors.name: DivisionByZero
errors.msg: Division by zero in price calculation

errors.name: FeedMismatch
errors.msg: Switchboard feed account mismatch — wrong feed passed

types.name: AuthorityTransferProposed
docs: Emitted when oracle authority transfer is proposed

types.name: AuthorityTransferred
docs: Emitted when oracle authority transfer is accepted

types.name: CpiMultiplierUpdated
docs: Emitted when CPI multiplier is updated

types.name: FeedEntry
docs: A single registered price feed entry

fields.name: feed_type
docs: How to interpret the price value

fields.name: active
docs: Whether this feed is currently active

types.name: FeedRegistered
docs: Emitted when a new price feed is registered globally

fields.name: authority
docs: Authority who can register new feeds

fields.name: base_type
docs: 0 = Direct after scaling, 1 = Inverse after scaling

fields.name: input_amount
docs: Input amount: USD cents for mint, token base units for redeem

fields.name: nonce
docs: Caller-provided nonce to avoid PDA collision between quotes

fields.name: mint
docs: The SSS token mint this oracle prices

fields.name: authority
docs: Authority that can update config, update CPI, pause/unpause

fields.name: feed_symbol
docs: Symbol of the registered feed to use (must exist in FeedRegistry)

fields.name: max_staleness_secs
docs: Maximum seconds since last feed update before price is rejected

fields.name: mint_fee_bps
docs: Mint fee in basis points (100 bps = 1%)

fields.name: max_confidence_bps
docs: Max allowed confidence interval as % of price (in bps)

fields.name: cpi_data_source
docs: Source description for CPI data audit trail

fields.name: total_minted_usd
docs: Lifetime stats: total USD value minted through oracle

fields.name: total_redeemed_usd
docs: Lifetime stats: total USD value redeemed through oracle

fields.name: total_fees_collected
docs: Lifetime stats: total fees collected in token base units

types.name: OracleInitialized
docs: Emitted when a new oracle config is initialized for a mint

types.name: OracleMint
docs: Emitted on a successful oracle-priced mint execution

types.name: OracleRedeem
docs: Emitted on a successful oracle-priced redemption

fields.name: input_amount
docs: Input amount (USD cents for mint, token units for redeem)

fields.name: output_amount
docs: Output amount (token units for mint, USD cents for redeem)

fields.name: valid_until
docs: Unix timestamp after which this quote is invalid

fields.name: nonce
docs: Caller nonce to prevent PDA collision

types.name: QuoteGenerated
docs: Emitted every time a quote is requested

fields.name: data_source
docs: Data source URL/description for audit trail
